scripts.build:dev: watchify -p browserify-hmr -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -t [ vueify ] -e src/app.js -o dist/index.js
scripts.files: rm dist/assets/* && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && node tasks.js
scripts.start: npm run style & npm run build:dev & npm run files & cd dist && serve
scripts.style: node-sass src/components/common/master.scss dist/style.css && node-sass src/components/common/master.scss dist/style.css -w
